src_original: anena khalu yogena laghubuddhatvamāpnuyāt || 1 ||  sarvakāmopabhogaistu sevyamānairyathecchataḥ |  svādhidaivatayogena parāṅgaiśca prapūjayet || 2 ||  duṣkarairniyamaistīvraiḥ sevyamāno na siddhyati |  sarvakāmopabhogaistu sevayaṁścāśu siddhyati || 3 ||
bhikṣāśinā na japtavyaṁ naiva bhaikṣyarato bhavet |
buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca mantracaryāgracāriṇaḥ |  prāptā dharmāsanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ sarvakāmopasevanaiḥ || 6 ||
